attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have recently been made unemployed after a decision by my local council to stop me driving school busses, I've been driving now for five years and during that time I have always conducted myself in a professional manner.

But due to the CRB checks i now find myself unemployed and unemployable.  My enhanced disclosure showed a conviction that is almost 20 years old a conviction that I have from the day of my arrest to the present day protested my innocence.

I have in the past satisfied the local councils checks in regards to CRB checks but now after the councils have moved the goalposts I no longer satisfy the requirements.

I've always been led to believe that everybody deserves a second chance so upon release from prison I have done everything possible to lead an honest life, and for all of my efforts over the last 20 years I find myself once again kicked into the gutter by the powers that be.

I ask the prime minister to look seriously at the situation I find myself in and the situation of others like me.
